attributes.action: Causing death by dangerous driving to be reclassified as involuntary manslaughter
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Such dangerous driving that causes the death of another person should result in a longer custodial sentence than at present.  Present sentences are totally inadequate and should be increased to at least 10 years in prison no matter the age of the driver with a charge of involuntary manslaughter.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
